code: import{Card,Button,Row,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{getAllPosts}from'../../../redux/postsRedux';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Posts=function Posts(){var posts=useSelector(getAllPosts);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{xs:1,md:1,lg:1,children:posts.map(function(post){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-1 flex-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:post.id})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-3 flex-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Status: "}),post.status]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ms-auto p-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/post/edit/"+post.id,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",children:"Show more"})})})]})})})},post.id);})});};export default Posts;
